full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BSKAL BZANG SANGS RGYAS STONG LA PHYAG MCHOD 'BUL TSUL MDOR BSDUS ZHIG BZHUGS, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,(ZHES PA 'DI NI, RIGS DANG BSOD NAMS STOBS KYIS MNGON PAR MTHO BA AER TE NI DA'I CHIN HO LO CHE JO NON AI THI GEL THU MER GEN GUNG NO YON TSE RING SKYABS MTSAN CAN NAS, ,BSKAL BZANG SANGS RGYAS STONG GI SKU THANG GSAR BZHENGS MDZAD NAS DUS BZANG RNAMS SU MCHOD CHOG RGYAS PA DANG, DUS RGYUN PAR RANG GI NYAMS BZHES SU MCHOD PA PHUL TE BSAGS SBYANGS STABS BDER BYA TSUL 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES GSUNG GI BSKUL MA MDZAD PA LTAR, BAN RGAN ^ DAM TSIG RDO RJES DAM PA GONG MA'I PHYAG BZHIS BZHIN BRIS TE PHUL BA 'DIS KYANG BSTAN 'GRO YONGS LA PHAN PA RGYA CHEN PO 'BYUNG BAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
